title: The Top 5 Ways to Overcome Social Anxiety in Sales, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO225
itunes:title: The Top 5 Ways to Overcome Social Anxiety in Sales, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO225
description: Anybody who is in business has experienced anxiety over the sales process. That’s normal. What’s also normal is that the people who can’t overcome that anxiety are going to crash & burn in business. That's too bad. Because there’s no reason that social anxiety over sales has to torpedo anyone’s dream of building a multi-million-dollar business. There are proven ways of dealing with your fear & getting to the point you actually enjoy the sales process. That’s what we talk about in today’s podcast.
